channel.title: New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 4/24/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added “Email Report” tab for enterprise users. Fixed an issue where some meetings on 04/21 midnight did not generate summaries. Fixed an error tooltip when the “Start Recording” button was used after exceeding the base quota in paid plans. Improved clarity of the “Connect Google Calendar” reminder popup. Updated the feedback survey shown during subscription cancellation. 4/17/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Adjusted the “Request Access” email â€” clicking the button will now redirect users to the “Share Meeting” popup on the meeting page.
